summary.para: Retrieves data corresponding to a file in the block map with the specified file name.

param.name: file
param.para: The data about the file's attributes and blocks.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The specified file name does not match the name of a file listed in the block map.

summary.para: Retrieves an enumerator for traversing the files listed in the block map.

param.name: enumerator
param.para: The enumerator of all the files listed in the block map.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the URI for the hash algorithm used to create block hashes in the block map.

param.name: hashMethod
param.para: The hash algorithm used in this block map.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The hashMethod value corresponds to the HashMethod attribute of the BlockMap root element.
GetHashMethod returns supported URIs for DigestMethods.

summary.para: Retrieves a read-only stream that represents the XML content of the block map.

param.name: blockMapStream
param.para: A read-only stream that represents the XML content of the block map.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapReader

summary.para: Represents a read-only object model for block maps that provides access to the file attributes and block hashes.

remarks.para: The IAppxBlockMapReader represents the BlockMap root element of the block map. File elements are the child elements of the BlockMap element.
This object can be retrieved using the or method of the interface, or the method of the interface.
For a code example, see the Query app package and app manifest sample.

member.seealso: Query app package and app manifest sample
